I don't know when the strike is finished, said Antiquities Minister Zahi Hawass , referring to the upheaval.`` I need things to go back to normal.'' Over 20 million children of conflict are out of school, said Ms. Angelina Jolie .`` Education is often forgotten.'' NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers .
